What the hell is that sound?
 ♪ Poppa rumbo, rumbo… ♪

Dammit, it sounds like they're having fun!

♪ Rumbo, rumbo… ♪
 It sounds like Sweet.

Oh?

 ♪ Hey, Poppa Joe, hey, Poppa Joe ♪

 The hell is Clark doing down there?!

♪ Rumbo, rumbo, hey, Poppa Joe, coconut ♪
 ♪ Poppa Joe, hey, Poppa Joe ♪
 - The hell?!

NGÂN HÀNG

Yeah, it was.
 -Janne, what the hell are you doing?! Huh?

You may learn a thing or two, Slufsen.

Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha.

Whoo!

We shouldn't draw any hasty conclusions,

Và tôi không phản bội!
 Được thôi! Thế bắn đám con tin thôi.

Chết tiệt, Janne!
 - Tôi thấy hắn. Gã ăn mặc như người Ả Rập. - Bắn đi, trời ạ!

en: Det är uppfattat.

en: Fan.

en: Helvete, jag missade.

en: -Det gick skitbra tills du kom hit. -Du bad mig komma hit.

You asked me to come here!
 You have failed with every freakin' thing.

You have no idea what you're doing!
 Blah, blah, blah!

If you're such a fucking pro,
 why aren't we sitting in the Mustang with the millions now, huh?

en: Va?

you damn chicken thief!
 Don't you fucking call me a chicken thief!
 Janne Olsson is the robber this time!

They're gonna write books and make movies about my life,

en: Dum-Tommy Ponny!

- Those damn idiots!
 DAY 2

Thằng ngu!
 NGÀY 2

I can't answer any questions.
 You could say that we have the situation under control.

But Chief Linderoth was very optimistic

Yes, we have a new plan. We're gonna--
 I'm afraid we cannot comment on that at this moment.

Well, I have no clue.
 -This was not my idea. -It was my idea.

Hiller, it was a terrible idea.
 Any further questions that I won't answer?

-Could you elaborate? -No.
 Well, according to the papers, the robber is extremely violent.

What do you mean? We're writing the news!
 Hey, it's like this.

en: Men polisen får hjälp. Vi har Clark Olofsson på plats.
pa:
how such a very horrible man can exist.
 But the police have help.
 We have Clark Olofsson in position.

en: -Absolut. -Jag litar inte en sekund på Olofsson.

Mm. Absolutely.
 I don't trust Clark Olofsson for one second.
vi: - Được nhiên. - Tôi không tin Clark Olofsson chút nào.

en: Förutom att han kommer att ställa till det. Det kan ni skriva upp.

en: Han verkar ha allierat sig med rånaren.

There, write that.
 He also seems to have joined forces with the robber.

en: Va?
pa: Huh?

en: Men en sak kan jag lova er. Vi kommer att få ut gisslan.

But I can promise you one thing.
 We will rescue the hostages.

en: Vi lägger oss inte platt för brottslingar.

en: Även om vi tvingas använda våld. Dödligt våld, dessutom. Tack.

vi: Chúng tôi sẽ không do dự sử dụng vũ lực. Nếu cần, có thể hạ mục tiêu. Cảm ơn.

pa:
But was it such a good idea,
 sending Sweden's most notorious bank robber into the bank?
vi: Liệu có sáng suốt khi cử kẻ cướp ngân hàng khét tiếng đến ngân hàng không?

en: Ryktet säger att han fick en pistol med sig som ni gav honom.

en: Jag kan inte kommentera det.
pa: I'm afraid I can't comment on that. Why did we agree to this?
vi: Không bình luận.

en: - Varför gick vi med på det här? -Om ni vill ta en bild, så…
pa: If you want to take a picture, I'm…
vi: - Sao ta lại đồng ý với việc này? - Cứ thoải mái chụp hình.

en: Hiller, H-I-L-L-E-R.
pa: Hiller. H-I-L-L-E-R.
vi: Hiller, H-I-L-L-E-R.

en: - Hiller! -Ta det lugnt, Tommy.
pa: - Hiller! -Calm down, Tommy.
vi: - Hiller! - Bình tĩnh đi, Tommy.

en: -Kan ni säga nåt? -Nä men, det är väl som Hiller säger…

And could you guys gives any comments?
 Uh… Well, it's just like Hiller says…

en: Rånaren står på sig. Han ger sig inte.

en: -Snutjävlar. -Vi måste få hit bilen, och jag ska köra.
pa:
Damn cops.
 Get the car here now. I'm driving.
vi: - Lũ cớm chó chết. - Cần xe ngay, tôi lái xe.

en: Han vill ha tre miljoner och Clark som chaufför.

en: Du ska inte köra nånstans.

en: Här är Norrmalmstorg, där vi bara väntar. Andra dygnet börjar lida mot sitt slut.

vi: Mọi người ở Norrmalmstorg đang đợi, khi ngày hai sắp qua…

en: -Du ska tillbaka till fängelset! -Det är hans jävla krav!

about us, about our future together.

I hope you know that."

as soon as this nightmare is over, if I survive.

Absolutely.

-Deadly force.

Palme?

or that six people die?

No.

en: Ja.

But sooner or later,

Well, you know, Clark,
 he really has nothing to do with all this, more or less.

Surely you realize that?
 Yes, he will, sooner or later.

And do you know what he does?

Yes, because I know

Oh, please.

Listen--

en: -Tack för hjälpen och hej då. -Hallå?
